fullText: Tom Stoppard's brilliant 1982 play about love, marriage, and the art of writing gets a first-rate revival starring Ewan McGregor and Maggie Gyllenhaal.
dtliExcerpt: Tom Stoppard's brilliant 1982 play about love, marriage, and the art of writing gets a first-rate revival starring Ewan McGregor and Maggie Gyllenhaal.
